pageContext.claim: “Hillary Clinton had an interview where she wasn't sworn in. She wasn't given the oath. They didn't take notes. They didn't record. And it was done on the Fourth of July weekend. That is perhaps ridiculous, and a lot of people looked upon that as being a very serious breach. And it really was.”
pageContext.analysis: Clinton was interviewed for 3 1/2 hours and the FBI agents did takes notes, though Clinton's interview was not transcribed. However, it would still be a crime if it was discovered that Clinton had lied to the FBI.
